metadata.title: CVE-2015-0861 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
model/modelstorage.py in trytond 3.2.x before 3.2.10, 3.4.x before 3.4.8,3.6.x before 3.6.5, and 3.8.x before 3.8.1 allows remote authenticatedusers to bypass intended access restrictions and write to arbitrary fieldsvia a sequence of records.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tryton-server - 3.8.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tryton-server package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.8.1-1').
